title: The Latest DOJ Announcement Should Sound The Alarms (Ep 1684)
description:
The latest announcement out of the DOJ should send shivers down your spine. In this episode, I address the disturbing developments. I also address the critical Supreme Court ruling against the Biden vaccine mandate. 

News Picks:


The Supreme Court scorches the Biden workplace vaccine mandate.


Senators Sinema and Manchin throw water on Joe Biden “burn the filibuster” plans.

Insane! Democrats are okay with fines and prison mandates for vaccine hesitant citizens. 

More good news about natural treatments for COVID infections. 

The federal government raised record tax revenue, yet we’re still running massive deficits.
